permafrost.tundra.server

Class CountingServerThreadFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.server.ServerThreadFactory
      • permafrost.tundra.server.CountingServerThreadFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory

    public class CountingServerThreadFactory
extends ServerThreadFactory
    A thread factory that creates webMethods Integration Server ServerThread threads.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong count
      The count of threads created by this factory, used to suffix thread names.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CountingServerThreadFactory

        public CountingServerThreadFactory(java.lang.String threadNamePrefix,
                                   com.wm.app.b2b.server.InvokeState invokeState)
        Constructs a new CountingServerThreadFactory.
        Parameters:
        threadNamePrefix - The threadNamePrefix of the factory, used to prefix thread names.
        invokeState - The invoke state to clone for each thread created.

      • CountingServerThreadFactory

        public CountingServerThreadFactory(java.lang.String threadNamePrefix,
                                   java.lang.String threadNameSuffix,
                                   com.wm.app.b2b.server.InvokeState invokeState,
                                   int threadPriority,
                                   boolean daemon)
        Constructs a new CountingServerThreadFactory.
        Parameters:
        threadNamePrefix - The threadNamePrefix of the factory, used to prefix thread names.
        threadNameSuffix - The suffix used on all created thread names.
        invokeState - The invoke state to clone for each thread created.
        threadPriority - The priority used for each thread created.
        daemon - Whether the created threads should be daemon threads.
